summary.seqs(fasta=C5.fasta)
##running list.seqs to generate names file
list.seqs(fasta=C5.fasta)
##take accnos file generated by list.seqs command and open in excel, copy the first column and paste it into the second column, copy datasheet and paste back into notepad and save as "filename".names 
##take names file youjust created and make groups file by opening it in excel, and delimitated the second column by _, and remove the resulting third coumn, paste back into notepasd and save as "filename".groups 
##remove low quality sequences determined by qual files
remove.seqs(accnos=C5under70-1.accnos, fasta=C5.fasta, name=C5.names, group=C5.groups)
summary.seqs(fasta=C5.pick.fasta)
align.seqs(fasta=C5.pick.fasta, reference=silva.nr_v119.align, flip=t)
summary.seqs(fasta=C5.pick.align, name=C5.pick.names)
screen.seqs(fasta=C5.pick.align, name=C5.pick.names, group=C5.pick.groups, start=1069, end=41775)
summary.seqs(fasta=C5.pick.good.align, name=C5.pick.good.names)
filter.seqs(fasta=C5.pick.good.align, trump=., vertical=T, processors=4)
summary.seqs(fasta=C5.pick.good.filter.fasta)
unique.seqs(fasta=C5.pick.good.filter.fasta)
summary.seqs(fasta=C5.pick.good.filter.unique.fasta, name=C5.pick.good.filter.names)
chimera.uchime(fasta=C5.pick.good.filter.unique.fasta, name=C5.pick.good.filter.names, group=C5.pick.good.groups, processors=4)
classify.seqs(fasta=C5.pick.good.filter.unique.fasta, group=C5.pick.good.groups, template=silva.nr_v119.align, name=C5.pick.good.filter.names, taxonomy=silva.nr_v119.tax)
remove.lineage(taxonomy=C5.pick.good.filter.unique.nr_v119.wang.taxonomy, fasta=C5.pick.good.filter.unique.fasta, group=C5.pick.good.groups, name=C5.pick.good.filter.names, taxon=unknown-Chloroplast)
summary.seqs(fasta=C5.pick.good.filter.unique.pick.fasta, name=C5.pick.good.filter.pick.names)
dist.seqs(fasta=C5.pick.good.filter.unique.pick.fasta, processors=4)
cluster(column=C5.pick.good.filter.unique.pick.dist, name=C5.pick.good.filter.pick.names)
make.shared(list=C5.pick.good.filter.unique.pick.an.list, group=C5.pick.good.pick.groups, label=0.03)
count.groups()
classify.otu(list=C5.pick.good.filter.unique.pick.an.list, name=C5.pick.good.filter.pick.names, taxonomy=C5.pick.good.filter.unique.nr_v119.wang.taxonomy, label=0.03)
